General.Name: Cliffmont Resources Ltd
General.Description: Cliffmont Resources Ltd., a junior resource company, engages in the exploration, development, and production of mineral properties. The company was formerly known as Atlas Minerals Inc. and changed its name to Cliffmont Resources Ltd. in February 2010. Cliffmont Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1095 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2M6
